      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      reads from the input stream the initialization command sent to it, sends back to the client an OKReply "ACK" msg, and then enters an infinite loop waiting to read from the input stream an RRObject obj that should really be of type TaskObjectsExecutionRequest, on which it executes its method obj.runProtocol(_srv,_ois, _oos).
      private void secondChance(RRObject obj)

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        reads from the input stream the initialization command sent to it, sends back to the client an OKReply "ACK" msg, and then enters an infinite loop waiting to read from the input stream an RRObject obj that should really be of type TaskObjectsExecutionRequest, on which it executes its method obj.runProtocol(_srv,_ois, _oos).
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
